summary: New, slimmer body mesh for men. Schlongs of Skyrim required!
descriptionHtml:
[b][size=6][center]Slimmer Males[/center][/size][/b][center][url=https://flic.kr/p/oZyqaU][img]https://farm4.staticflickr.com/3855/15091214062_afa75d71b9_c.jpg[/img][/url][/center][center][/center][center]This is a body mesh for males, created with Opac21's amazing[i] Male Body studio for Bodyslide2[/i]. If you want your men looks more femine, less bulky, this is for you![/center][size=3][b]FAQ[/b][/size]

[b]Does this work without SoS?[/b]
Partially, and only if you use the latest, SoS compatible version of XPMS skeleton. But most probably there will be seams at the neck and the hands, and a hole where the penis should be. The shape will also be slightly different. Otherwise, your game will crash when you undress your character.

[b]Why do I need SoS for a simple body mesh mod?[/b]
Because I made it with Opac21's Male bodyslide, and it is based on Schlongs of Skyrim. There are no other Male Bodyslide yet :(

[b]Does this work with SoS light?[/b]
No. SoS light uses a different body mesh, with the penis built-in, so if you use my mesh, there will be no penis. :(

Outfits?
Maybe later. But since this mesh is similar to Sundracon meshes (kinda), you can use those meshes.
[b][size=3]
Installation:[/size][/b]
If you have Schlongs of Skyrim (which is very necessary), it's easy. Just drop the folders in the 'Data' folder and overwrite if asked.

I recommand using it with my other male mod, [url=http://www.nexusmods.com/skyrim/mods/57952/?]Milkdrinker male textures[/url]. It is also made for less muscular men. :)
[i][b]Credits[/b]
[/i][i]Vectorplexus, Smurf and b3lisario for Schlongs of Skyrim
Opac21 for Mlae body for Bodyslide2 and Outfit studio[/i]
author: Fiszi
